Row.Text: Your people thrive by wit and war alike, O wise ruler of the Saxons. Let your name echo through the ages.

Hail, proud leader of the Saxons! Yours is a people forged in the iron of law and hearth of loyalty, standing firm in the face of both kin and conqueror. Through wisdom and warcraft, you have endured, shaping the land with ink and fire. Now, shall you forge a new age of prosperity, where your shires prosper, your warriors stand unyielding, and your name is sung in the halls of history? The world awaits your decree.
Your Ceorl army can protect your empire while you settle varried terrain.
